snippet: Beginning in 2014, the award will be open to all novels originally written in English and published in Britain no matter where the author is from.
abstract: Administrators of Man Booker Prize announce that, beginning in 2014, literary award will be open to all novels originally written in English and published in Britain regardless of author's nationality.
lead_paragraph: Beginning in 2014, the award will be open to all novels originally written in English and published in Britain no matter where the author is from.

headline.main: Under New Guidelines, Man Booker Prize to Be Open to Americans
